post:
Hi,

Since the server I bought yesterday is unreachable most of the time I want to switch to another provider.

Looking for a vps with minimum of 2 G memory and located near or in the Netherlands. Disksize is not that important, diskspeed does. Memory is important, the more the better.
2 * Ipv4 and Ipv6
64 bit Centos or 64 bit Debian
instant setup

Hoping to see some nice offers here.
